snippet: A federal appeals court rejected Google’s bid to dismiss a lawsuit accusing it of violating a federal wiretap law when it collected data for its Street View program.
lead_paragraph: A federal appeals court rejected Google’s bid to dismiss a lawsuit accusing it of violating a federal wiretap law when it collected data for its Street View program.

headline.main: Opinion in Google Street View Privacy Case

keywords.value: Wiretapping and Other Eavesdropping Devices and Methods
keywords.name: subject
